authorAttributions.displayName: Battery Park City Chiropractic, Dr. Steven D. Cohen

adrFormatAddress: 200 Vesey St, New York, NY 10281, USA

originalText.text:
I have been seeing Dr. Cohen for several months now, and I am impressed with the quality of care that I have received. From my initial visit, I could tell that Dr. Cohen is not only very experienced, but also genuinely respectful and friendly. He always asks about my condition and is knowledgeable to target my problems areas. He also provides good background into what is happening with my body and then practices what he preaches.

What sets Dr. Cohen apart is his personalized approach to chiropractic care. I have found my visits here to be more beneficial than physical therapy. The adjustments and advice I've received have alleviated my discomfort and improved my day-to-day life.

I have been seeing Dr. Cohen for the last several months and I know that he has become my go-to person for any chiropractic needs.

originalText.text: Fantastic and great service Highly recommend DR. Steven D. Cohen made a call as i have been traveling for vacation and had lower back issue and made same day appointment. Got right to the point and focused on what needed to be worked on and super convenient and very professional and had a wonderful experience and will bring wife in to also get her back checked out as well as friends. Well done and feel amazing today! Thank you Dr.Cohen see you soon. I am very satisfied with your work.

text.text: Fantastic and great service Highly recommend DR. Steven D. Cohen made a call as i have been traveling for vacation and had lower back issue and made same day appointment. Got right to the point and focused on what needed to be worked on and super convenient and very professional and had a wonderful experience and will bring wife in to also get her back checked out as well as friends. Well done and feel amazing today! Thank you Dr.Cohen see you soon. I am very satisfied with your work.

originalText.text: I've been going to Steven for 9 years now and i would not change him as chiropractor. I originally looked for activator method and found him. He is much more than just chiropractic care and a regular adjustment. He talks to you and explains things and gives you pointers on what to do to get better results. He always addresses the whole issue, not just the pain point. I absolutely love that every time i see him i get the adjustment i need and come out of there feeling lighter. If you are looking for someone to really care about you and your body, that's him. Not someone that passes you along to someone else or rushes to get rid of you and just takes your money. Yes, he's more traditional when it comes to paperwork but the care he provides trumps all that. I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: Dr. Cohen honestly cares about the health of his patients. After going to him for 5+ years, I walk away from each adjustment feeling better than before and have the knowledge of what was misaligned in my back (which helps me communicate what I'm feeling next time I come in for an adjustment). In addition to being knowledgeable, he is also very thorough with his diagnostic and always proactive on checking other areas for any other misalignments.
